filmdata.title: Top Gun: Maverick
filmdata.description:
After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator,
but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates
on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: Nope
filmdata.description:
After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator,
but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates
on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: Death on the Nile
filmdata.description: This whodunit sequel to 2017's Murder on the Orient Express earned 20th Century Studios their No. 1 hit of 2022, which earned $137 million worldwide. Meanwhile, director and star Kenneth Branagh kicked off the great mustache trend of 2022.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: The Gray Man
filmdata.description: Netflix nabbed the Russo brothers’ big-budget, high-octane action thriller for a streaming debut in summer 2022. The film peaked at No. 1 on MOVIEmeter soon after, thanks to the star power of Ryan Gosling, Chris Evans, Ana de Armas, and Dhanush.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: The Northman
filmdata.description: Director Robert Eggers expanded his global fanbase by casting Alexander Skarsgård as a Viking prince on a murderous quest for revenge in The Northman. Next, the director will bring his original vision to his take on Nosferatu.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: X
filmdata.description: Ti West’s microbudget slasher X made waves at the box office, raking in $14.8 million worldwide. With a surprise prequel release just six months later, and a third film in the works, X may have revived the grand tradition of horror franchises.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
filmdata.description: Grossing $331 million worldwide, the follow-up to Black Panther landed the second-largest opening weekend of 2022. The sequel — which paid tribute to Chadwick Boseman and his heroic character, T'Challa — served as the closing chapter to Phase Four of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
filmdata.description: The Sorcerer Supreme conjured Marvel’s best global box office tally of 2022 (though Wakanda Forever is in pursuit). The superhero sequel was a triumphant return for Sam Raimi as well, as the director scored his highest-grossing movie to date.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
filmdata.description: Screaming goats and the return of Jane Foster helped Marvel’s God of Thunder earn $760 million at the global box office. Fan reactions to Love and Thunder were uneven, but we’re hoping that Chris Hemsworth will return for one more round with Mjölnir.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

filmdata.title: The Batman
filmdata.description: Director Matt Reeves brought the DC Comics icon back to his roots in this brooding detective thriller. The Batman delighted both fans and critics, thanks in part to the stellar cast, including Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz, Paul Dano, and an unrecognizable Colin Farrell as The Penguin.
filmdata.writers: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr,  Peter Craig
filmdata.actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller
